nodes.text: Auto-fighters were automated TIE line starfighters that were produced by the forces under Commodore Visler Korda on Rekkana. Eventually, Rekkana was liberated by New Republic General Lando Calrissian, Rekk Chancellor Asera, and the bounty hunter Jaxxon. The resistance was able to take control of the remote fighters and have them fire on the Imperial formation, ruining Korda's presentation.
The auto-fighters appear in "Hare-Brained Heist," published in IDW Publishing's Star Wars Adventures Annual 2019.
In Star Wars Legends, the Auto-Fighter first appeared in the Star Wars: Dark Empire comic book as the TIE/D automated starfighter.[source?]
